# dmcloud_project (Data Source)

Can be used to find the id of a project.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dmcloud_project" "my_project" {
  name = "my_project"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the project

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the project
